topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Playing

name: libcdaudio
short_description: libcdaudio is an unmaintained but portable library that provides wrapper functions to audio CD drives and CDDB and CDIndex database access. cdcd is a commandline CD player using libcdaudio's CDDB and CDIndex functions.
